name: QOMO, Inc.
description: QOMO, Inc. is a leading provider of interactive technology solutions designed to enhance communication and collaboration in educational and corporate environments. Founded in 2009, QOMO focuses on integrating advanced technology into traditional learning and meeting spaces to improve engagement and productivity. The company offers a wide range of innovative products, including interactive whiteboards, document cameras, and presentation software that enable seamless interaction between users and content. QOMO is committed to delivering high-quality solutions that cater to diverse needs, whether in classrooms, conference rooms, or remote learning settings. With a strong emphasis on usability and customer support, QOMO aims to empower educators and business professionals alike to create dynamic and interactive experiences. As technology continues to evolve, QOMO remains at the forefront of the industry, constantly adapting its offerings to meet the changing demands of its customers while enhancing the way people teach, learn, and collaborate.

seo.meta_title: QOMO, Inc. | Interactive Technology Solutions for Education and Business
seo.meta_description: Explore QOMO, Inc., a leader in interactive technology solutions that enhance collaboration in educational and corporate environments. Discover innovative products and services.

faq.question: What does QOMO specialize in?
faq.answer: QOMO specializes in interactive technology solutions for education and business environments.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of QOMO?
faq.answer: Mark H. Gage is the CEO of QOMO, Inc.

faq.question: Where is QOMO headquartered?
faq.answer: QOMO is headquartered in San Diego, California, USA.

faq.question: What are QOMO's main products?
faq.answer: QOMO's main products include interactive whiteboards, document cameras, and collaboration tools.
